section.title: Location/Lot/Serial # Detail
section.para: To locate detailed location and lot/serial number information, select the Location/Lot/Serial # Detail option. The following screen will appear:
When displaying detailed location and lot/serial number information, you are presented with the following options:

listitem.para: Enter the item number of the item whose detailed location/lot/serial number information you want to display.
Select to display detailed location/lot/serial number information for all sites.
Specify site whose detailed location/lot/serial number information you want to display.
Display lists location/lot/serial number detail, using the specified parameters.
